LanguageData.PicnicAreaTemperatureRangeDesc: Valid temperature ranges for having a picnic
LanguageData.PicnicAreaTimeRangeDesc: Valid times of the day for having a picnic
LanguageData.PicnicAreaZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will eat and enjoy the outdoors. The area needs sittable furniture but not tables. It will only be used in fine weather.
